body:
If we can install a version of pip that supports hashing from Ubuntu's repos, that's ideal. The pipstrap README says 

> When your OS packages pip 8 or you otherwise get a copy of pip 8 you trust onto your servers, you can dispense with Pipstrap.

I haven't checked if Ubuntu has such a package. If not, then pipstrap is the next best option.
